Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/uvw/src/uvw/loop.cpp

1#ifdef UVW_AS_LIB
2#include "loop.h"
3#endif
4
5#include "config.h"
6
7
8namespace uvw {
9
10
11UVW_INLINE Loop::Loop(std::unique_ptr<uv_loop_t, Deleter> ptr) noexcept
12 : loop{std::move(ptr)}
13{}
14
15
16UVW_INLINE std::shared_ptr<Loop> Loop::create() {
17 auto ptr = std::unique_ptr<uv_loop_t, Deleter>{new uv_loop_t, [](uv_loop_t *l) {
18 delete l;
19 }};
20
21 auto loop = std::shared_ptr<Loop>{new Loop{std::move(ptr)}};
22
23 if(uv_loop_init(loop->loop.get())) {
24 loop = nullptr;
25 }
26
27 return loop;
28}
29
30
31UVW_INLINE std::shared_ptr<Loop> Loop::create(uv_loop_t *loop) {
32 auto ptr = std::unique_ptr<uv_loop_t, Deleter>{loop, [](uv_loop_t *) {}};
33 return std::shared_ptr<Loop>{new Loop{std::move(ptr)}};
34}
35
36
37UVW_INLINE std::shared_ptr<Loop> Loop::getDefault() {
38 static std::weak_ptr<Loop> ref;
39 std::shared_ptr<Loop> loop;
40
41 if(ref.expired()) {
42 auto def = uv_default_loop();
43
44 if(def) {
45 auto ptr = std::unique_ptr<uv_loop_t, Deleter>(def, [](uv_loop_t *) {});
46 loop = std::shared_ptr<Loop>{new Loop{std::move(ptr)}};
47 }
48
49 ref = loop;
50 } else {
51 loop = ref.lock();
52 }
53
54 return loop;
55}
56
57
58UVW_INLINE Loop::~Loop() noexcept {
59 if(loop) {
60 close();
61 }
62}
63
64
65UVW_INLINE void Loop::close() {
66 auto err = uv_loop_close(loop.get());
67 return err ? publish(ErrorEvent{err}) : loop.reset();
68}
69
70
71template<Loop::Mode mode>
72bool Loop::run() noexcept {
73 auto utm = static_cast<std::underlying_type_t<Mode>>(mode);
74 auto uvrm = static_cast<uv_run_mode>(utm);
75 return (uv_run(loop.get(), uvrm) == 0);
76}
77
78
79UVW_INLINE bool Loop::alive() const noexcept {
80 return !(uv_loop_alive(loop.get()) == 0);
81}
82
83
84UVW_INLINE void Loop::stop() noexcept {
85 uv_stop(loop.get());
86}
87
88
89UVW_INLINE int Loop::descriptor() const noexcept {
90 return uv_backend_fd(loop.get());
91}
92
93
94UVW_INLINE std::pair<bool, Loop::Time> Loop::timeout() const noexcept {
95 auto to = uv_backend_timeout(loop.get());
96 return std::make_pair(to == -1, Time{to});
97}
98
99
100UVW_INLINE Loop::Time Loop::now() const noexcept {
101 return Time{uv_now(loop.get())};
102}
103
104
105UVW_INLINE void Loop::update() const noexcept {
106 return uv_update_time(loop.get());
107}
108
109
110UVW_INLINE void Loop::fork() noexcept {
111 auto err = uv_loop_fork(loop.get());
112
113 if(err) {
114 publish(ErrorEvent{err});
115 }
116}
117
118
119UVW_INLINE void Loop::data(std::shared_ptr<void> uData) {
120 userData = std::move(uData);
121}
122
123
124UVW_INLINE const uv_loop_t *Loop::raw() const noexcept {
125 return loop.get();
126}
127
128
129UVW_INLINE uv_loop_t *Loop::raw() noexcept {
130 return const_cast<uv_loop_t *>(const_cast<const Loop *>(this)->raw());
131}
132
133
134// explicit instantiations
135
136template bool Loop::run<Loop::Mode::DEFAULT>() noexcept;
137template bool Loop::run<Loop::Mode::ONCE>() noexcept;
138template bool Loop::run<Loop::Mode::NOWAIT>() noexcept;
139
140
141}
